name: FAITH - Demon Siege
description:
'FAITH: Demon Siege' is a survival-shooter fangame of Airdorf's 'FAITH' series.

Check out the original FAITH!

Welcome to Brimdale Forest. In the year 1951, multiple reports of demonic activity prompted the church to get involved in the matter. Priests were dispatched to the location but were never heard from again.

After many more years of people disappearing, getting attacked by seemingly nothing, and strange noises in the area, this location has earned the title of "Satan's Grove". Years later, John Ward is informed about the location. Are you worthy of cleansing Satan's Grove once and for all?

Starting with nothing, you enter the grove and fend off demons. After each wave, a shop will open where you can upgrade your stats or buy items that modify your attacks and defense. 

Each wave gets increasingly harder, introducing more and more demon types that each have their own unique attacks and abilities. Be careful though, there's something more sinister lurking in the woods...
